author: Mary McCord
title: Trump’s ‘LIBERATE MICHIGAN!’ tweets incite insurrection. That’s illegal. - The Washington Post
description: Trump’s ‘LIBERATE MICHIGAN!’ tweets incite insurrection. That’s illegal. The Washington Post View Full Coverage on Google News
content: Trump tweeted, LIBERATE MINNESOTA! followed immediately by LIBERATE MICHIGAN! and then LIBERATE VIRGINIA, and save your great 2nd Amendment. It is under siege! This follows Wednesdays demonstration in Michigan, in which armed protestors surrounded the state c… [+4856 chars]
